Notes: Create New Type for GetParticipants API. The requirement from our sites is that they have a type within the Get Participants API which would return only participants who have had some kind of refusal or withdrawal.
Derivation Notes: HdRef_AnyRefOrWd_v1r0 = 1 IF HdRef_Basesrv_v1r0 = 1 OR HdRef_Baseblood_v1r0 = 1 OR HdRef_Baseurine_v1r0 = 1 OR HdRef_Basesaliva_v1r0 = 1 OR HdRef_Allsrv_v1r0 = 1 OR HdRef_Allsample_v1r0 = 1 OR HdRef_BlSpecSrv_v1r0 = 1 OR HdWd_Destroydata_v1r0 = 1 OR HdWd_HIPAArevoked_v1r0 = 1 OR HdWd_WdConsent_v1r0 = 1 OR HdWd_Activepart_v1r0 = 1 OR HdWd_Deceased_v1r0 = 1 OR HdWd_SuspendContact_v1r0 = 1
